name: Vineshaper Mystic
originalText: When Vineshaper Mystic enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target Merfolk you control.

rulings.text: You can’t target the same Merfolk twice to have it receive two +1/+1 counters.
Vineshaper Mystic can be the target of its own ability.
